ComputerVision::ImageThresholdFilter

ComputerVision::ImageThresholdFilter Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for ComputerVision::ImageThresholdFilter:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

For internal use only.

Applies a fixed-level threshold filter to an image -> thus polarizing it. This is usually used to get bi-level (binary) image out of grayscale image


Public Member Functions

void apply (const IplImage &inImage)

Member Function Documentation

void ComputerVision::ImageThresholdFilter::apply ( const IplImage &  inImage  ) 

For internal use only.

Applies a threshold filter to an image -> thus polarizing it

Note:
the result is stored in m_outputImage of the base filter class
Parameters:
[in] inImage Image that will be thresholded (polarized)
